New Records: Naseem Shah clobbered consecutive sixes off fast bowler Fazalhaq Farooqi off the first two deliveries of the final over to take Pakistan to 9-131 and the victory.
Key Match Events: Afghanistan bowler Fareed Ahmed and Pakistan batter Asif Ali nearly came to blows during their Asia Cup T20 clash.
Fans were stunned by the footage on social media, and even more alarmed by violence among the crowd after the match, which saw spectators hurling chairs at one another.
Post-Match Reflections: Pakistan skipper Babar Azam said, 'To be honest, it was quite a tensed environment in the dressing room.'
Afghanistan captain Mohammad Nabi said, 'The boys were brilliant with the ball and in the field, but again we didn't finish well.'
Miscellaneous Highlights: Pakistan's thrilling T20 victory over Afghanistan at the Asia Cup has been overshadowed by a nasty incident between the two sides in the dying stages of the nail-biting clash.
Pakistan's pace bowlers and spinner also did well to restrict Afghanistan to 6-129.
Others: Pakistan's win also ended India's slim chances to reach Sunday's final.
19-year-old Naseem Shah clean bowled captain Mohammad Nabi for a golden duck.
